description.value:
Every mind murmurs constantly, and the static from those nearby reverberates in your head like wind through leaves. What better focus for your magic then, than the very thoughts of those around you? Your versatile telepathic abilities let you soothe and communicate with your allies or control your enemies.

Granted Spells

  • 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Mindlink]
  • 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Touch of Idiocy]
  • 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Heroism]
  • 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Telepathy]
  • 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Synaptic Pulse]
  • 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Sending]
  • 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Visions of Danger]
  • 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Uncontrollable Dance]
  • 9th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Telepathic Demand]

Standard Psi Cantrips

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Daze]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Message]

Unique Psi Cantrips

  • surface: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Forbidden Thought]
  • deeper: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shatter Mind]
  • deepest: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Contagious Idea]
